article: media mogul silvio berlusconi battled to stay in power in italian parliamentary elections sunday with his conservatives trying to beat back a strong challenge from romano prodi , a former premier who leads a coalition ranging from moderates to communists .
abstract: berlusconi battles to stay in power as italians vote
